# DocumentObservation.Container.Text.Alignment.center

**Case**

Text aligns horizontally to the center of the container.

## Declaration

```swift
case center
```

## Getting the alignment

- **DocumentObservation.Container.Text.Alignment.leading**: Text aligns to the left edge of the container.
- **DocumentObservation.Container.Text.Alignment.trailing**: Lines aligned with a right edge within the container.
